data.name: Survarium - Steam Sniper Pack
data.detailed_description:
If your style is eliminating opponents at a distance then this Sniper Pack is exactly what you need! We made sure to include high-profile gear to allow you compete in the top-rank battles in Survarium. Let your new motto be: one shot – one kill!

Includes

The Unique Remington 700 "Executioner" in Steam Camo

The name says it all. Execute your enemies and leave others in fear with this popular breed of rifle. Power is the secret here.

Bonuses of this item include:
  • All weapon module slots unlocked
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • +25% Silver gain

30 Days of Premium

Advance your character. Gain extra experience, silver, faction reputation, and spare parts!

Bonuses of this item include:
    +50% Silver+50% Reputation+50% Experience+50% Spare Parts

3 Stash Maps

Use stash maps to find loot in Treasure Hunt in the game.

Exclusive Deer Hunter Decal

Place it anywhere on your character's jacket or pants.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (Service Pack 1), Windows 8.1 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better / AMD Phenom II X4 / AMD FX / AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD: NTFS file system required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better / AMD Phenom II X4 / AMD FX / AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce: GTX 960 / GTX 1050-Ti or AMD Radeon: R9 280X / RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD: NTFS file system required
